Mystra's Blessing

Bless grants an additional 1d4 to saving throws and normal attacks, and an additional 2d4 to spells using attack rolls.

Staff of Arcane Blessing

Mystra's Blessing is an Equipment Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Equipment Features provide passive effects or new conditions that will help you in combat.
